overview: Video #11″As skateboarding falls into the limelight of mainstream society skateboarders are adapting to the evergrowing restrictions and adversities placed upon them From patching cracks to building personal skateparks ie explores the experience of pushing the boundaries of skateboarding in a world full of limitations”  Anthony Pappalardo, Caine Gayle, Daewon Song, Diego Bucchieri, Mark Appleyard, Rob Dyrdek
title: i.e.
